services.name: Shorten Sleeves
services.description: Reduces the sleeve length  while maintaining the original finish and shape where possible.

services.name: Crop
services.description: Reduces the length while maintaining the original finish and shape where possible.

services.name: Take in from Sides
services.description: Reduces the width through the side seams, this can be altered by usually a maximum of 2 inches to ensure a balance in the overall shape.

services.name: Zip replacement
services.description: Ideal for when your zipper is damaged, stuck or no longer functions correctly. We have a stock of standard zips and can not guarantee an exact match to the original.

questions.question: Would you like the main zip replaced or a smaller zip replaced?

services.name: Up-size
services.description: Increase the width or length of your garment

questions.question: Is there seam allowance?
questions.explainer: Check the inside seam for extra fabric on the inside of a garment, found along the seams where the fabric pieces are stitched together.

subservices.name: Add side panels
subservices.description: Adding a panel of fabric into the side seams, in a contrasting or matching fabric colour. We recommend to send in a matched item of the same style and fabric for our tailors to match the measurements to.

questions.question: What material would you like for the panels?
questions.explainer: Adding a panel of fabric to hem, in a contrasting or matching fabric colour. We recommend to send in a matched item of the same style and fabric for our tailors to match the measurements to.

subservices.name: Add Panel to hem
subservices.description: Adding a panel of fabric to hem, in a contrasting or matching fabric colour. We recommend to send in a matched item of the same style and fabric for our tailors to match the measurements to.

questions.question: What material would you like for the panels?
questions.explainer: We can either use material you supply or use what we have in the studio. This can be a close match in terms of material colour and fabric or a contrast colour.

subservices.name: Widen using existing seam allowance
subservices.description: Discrete method of widening using existing seam allowance to let out the sides. Please keep in mind that previous stitch marks my be visible when first completed but this will fade with wear and washes.

subservices.name: Lengthen using existing seam allowance
subservices.description: Discrete method of lengthening by letting down the existing seam. Please keep in mind that previous stitch marks my be visible when first completed but this will fade with wear and washes.

services.name: Fix stitching
services.description: Repairs seams or stitches that have come undone or are loose. Ideal for when the thread holding the fabric together is damaged, loose, or has unraveled.

questions.question: How many rips/ holes do you need fixing?
What is the size of your hole(s)/ rip(s)
questions.explainer: Please give the average size of the holes or rips when there are varying sizes. Please measure from the widest part.

questions.question: Would you prefer a close colour match or a contrast? Please specify 'close match' or your desired contrast colour.
questions.explainer: If you choose close colour match we will select the closest match from our selection of over 2,000 yarns. We cannot guarantee an exact match.

subservices.name: Patch
subservices.description: We can create patches using either excess material from the garment or use a close colour match to create discrete patches. Alternatively we can create patches in a contrast colour similar to the style of Sashiko mending techniques.

subservices.name: Create discrete seam
subservices.description: We can pull the rip/ hole into a small seam leaving a small line where the material has been taken in to find the damage.

subservices.name: Fix rip along seam
subservices.description: Repairs a single tear or damage along a seam, where the pieces of fabric are stitched together. Ideal for small rips caused by snagging or wear and tear to maintain the structural integrity. In some cases depending on the damage we will need to take in the fabric to ensure a clean new durable seam, this can slightly alter the fit of the original shape.

services.name: Replace ribbing
services.description: Replace worn away ribbing at the cuffs, neckline, bottom ribbing

subservices.name: Re-knit holes
subservices.description: We can re-knit holes in your knitwear. INVISIBILITY IS NOT GUARANTEED this depends on whether we can source yarn from the seam of the jumper for a perfect colour match. If not we will use as close match yarn as possible from our selection in the studio.

questions.question: How many holes do you need fixing?
What is the average size of your hole/s?
How thick is your knit?

subservices.name: Re-knit holes - Contrast Colour
subservices.description: We can re-knit holes in your knitwear. INVISIBILITY IS NOT GUARANTEED this depends on whether we can source yarn from the seam of the jumper for a perfect colour match. If not we will use as close match yarn as possible from our selection in the studio.

questions.question: How many holes do you need fixing?
What is the average size of your hole/s?
How thick is your knit?
What colour yarn would you like for your contrast?

services.name: Elbow patches
services.description: Are the elbows of your jumper becoming thin for gained new holes? We can patch these with elbow patches.

questions.question: What colour would you like?

services.name: Fix frayed edges
services.description: We can restore the frayed edges of your sleeves or the bottom of your jumper

questions.question: Which are of your jumper would you like fixing?
questions.explainer: We can fix the sleeves the bottom of the jumper or the neck line

services.name: Fix rip along seam
services.description: If the seam has come apart

services.name: Replace buttons / poppers
services.description: We can source a close match button or source the same buttons if possible

questions.question: How many buttons would you like replacing?
How many buttons would you like replacing?

services.name: Fix pulls in jumper
services.description: Have small threads been caught and pulled we can fix these!

questions.question: How many pulls would you like to fix?

services.name: De-pilling
services.description: We can remove all pilling from your jumper/ cardigan

questions.question: Would you like de-pill the whole garment or just a small area?

services.name: Shorten Sleeves
services.description: Reduces the sleeve length  while maintaining the original finish and shape where possible.

services.name: Crop
services.description: Reduces the length while maintaining the original finish and shape where possible.

services.name: Take in from Sides
services.description: Reduces the width through the side seams, this can be altered by usually a maximum of 2 inches to ensure a balance in the overall shape.

questions.question: Does your Top have lining?
questions.explainer: This is a layer of material inside the top separate to the outer layer

services.name: Zip replacement
services.description: Ideal for when your zipper is damaged, stuck or no longer functions correctly. We have a stock of standard zips and can not guarantee an exact match to the original.

questions.question: Would you like the main zip replaced or a smaller zip replaced?

subservices.name: Source bespoke zip
subservices.description: We are not always able to find an exact match but we will source the closest match. We cannot guarantee pullers will be the same. This will likely mean the turn-around time will be longer while we order.

subservices.name: Zip colour - Standard Black
subservices.description: We will match the type of zip eg plastic, metal, waterproof, invisible

subservices.name: Zip colour - Standard Navy
subservices.description: We will match the type of zip eg plastic, metal, waterproof, invisible

subservices.name: Zip colour - Standard Green
subservices.description: We will match the type of zip eg plastic, metal, waterproof, invisible

subservices.name: Zip colour - Standard Red
subservices.description: We will match the type of zip eg plastic, metal, waterproof, invisible

subservices.name: Zip colour - Standard Grey
subservices.description: We will match the type of zip eg plastic, metal, waterproof, invisible
